CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. 9 reads: "Beaver Valley "Pros" - Beaver Valley Progressive Cosmetologists made their debut recently with an impressive membership tea at Triedstone Baptist Church. Members, standing left to right, are Mmes. Grace Simmons, Zella Poindexter, Thelma Witherspoon, Lena Thomas, president; Sara Reddick, Ruth Brown, Opra Henderson, Lottie Bazemore, Clara Jenkins and Jessie Dawson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Beaver Valley Progressive Cosmetologists members, from left, standing: Grace Simmons, Zella Poindexter, Thelma Witherspoon, Lena Thomas, Sara Reddick, Ruth Brown, Opra Henderson, Lottie Bazemore, Clara Jenkins, and Jessie Dawson, gathered for membership tea at Triedstone Baptist Church
